DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the antibacterial activity of Epiduo® Gel (Adapalene 0.1% / Benzoyl Peroxide 2.5% Gel) on P. acnes compared to that of Benzoyl Peroxide 2.5% Gel.
DOC.brief_title: Anti Propionibacterium(P.) Acnes Activity of Epiduo® Gel Compared to Benzoyl Peroxide (BPO) 2.5% Gel
DOC.criteria: Subjects with facial acne, Subjects with high levels of P. acnes counts on the forehead Female Subjects who are pregnant, nursing or planning a pregnancy during the study, Subjects with acne conglobata, acne fulminans, secondary acne Subjects with known or suspected allergy to one of the test product
